title: Writhing Remains
summaries: The Writhing Remains is a pet-summoning item that summons a pet Eater of Worms to follow the player around. The Writhing Remains has a 1/4 (25%) chance of being dropped by the Eater of Worlds in Master Mode.

statistics.Tooltip:
Summons the Eater of Worms
'It'll give you worms!'
statistics.Sell: 5 GC
